estates.sub_title: From the open floor plan to the abundance of light from the windows, this home is perfect for entertaining.
estates.description: This 3-bed with a loft, 2-bath home in the gated community of The Hideout has it all. From the open floor plan to the abundance of light from the windows, this home is perfect for entertaining. The living room and dining room have vaulted ceilings and a beautiful fireplace. You will love spending time on the deck taking in the beautiful views. In the kitchen, you'll find stainless steel appliances and a tile backsplash, as well as a breakfast bar.

estates.sub_title: Experience luxury living at its finest in this stunning penthouse located in the heart of Manhattan
estates.description: Experience luxury living at its finest in this stunning penthouse located in the heart of Manhattan. With 4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, and breathtaking views of the city skyline, it's an urban oasis. The interior features high-end finishes, a gourmet kitchen, and expansive living spaces. Building amenities include a pool, spa, fitness center, concierge service, and private elevator access.

estates.sub_title: Escape to the idyllic countryside of Provence in this luxurious villa surrounded by groves
estates.description: Escape to the idyllic countryside of Provence in this luxurious villa surrounded by vineyards and olive groves. With 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, and a private pool, it's the perfect retreat. The villa features elegant interiors, a gourmet kitchen, and spacious living areas. Outdoor amenities include a tennis court, wine cellar, outdoor kitchen, spa, and landscaped gardens.

estates.sub_title: Live in style in this sleek and modern townhouse located in the heart of London.
estates.description: Live in style in this sleek and modern townhouse located in the heart of London. With 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and an open-plan layout, it offers contemporary living at its best. The townhouse features high-end finishes, a designer kitchen, and a private terrace. Building amenities include a gym, rooftop garden, concierge service, cinema room, and underground parking.

estates.sub_title: Experience alpine living in this charming mountain chalet nestled in the Swiss Alps
estates.description: Experience alpine living in this charming mountain chalet nestled in the Swiss Alps. With 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and panoramic mountain views, it's an ideal retreat for nature lovers. The chalet features rustic-chic interiors, a cozy fireplace, and a spacious deck. Outdoor amenities include a sauna, hot tub, ski storage, barbecue area, and landscaped garden.

estates.sub_title: Live the ultimate island lifestyle in this stunning beachfront house on the shores of Hawaii.
estates.description: Live the ultimate island lifestyle in this stunning beachfront house on the shores of Hawaii. With 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and direct beach access, it's paradise found. The house features tropical-inspired interiors, a gourmet kitchen, and expansive lanais. Outdoor amenities include a pool, outdoor shower, barbecue area, surfboard storage, and lush landscaping.
